definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Father Mabeuf was one of those persons for whom plants have souls.
sentences.chinese: 和某些人一样，马白夫公公也认为植物是有灵魂的。

sentences.english: He died in 1892, his death being considered as a national calamity.
sentences.chinese: 他死于1892年，他的逝世被认为是举国的不幸。

sentences.english: Some experts consider that E -magazine and paper magazine will supplement each other.
sentences.chinese: 业内专家认为，网络杂志和纸介杂志将相辅相承。

sentences.english: I don't think he will jump his hotel bill.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他不会不付旅馆账单就溜掉的。

sentences.english: I think we should let Sylvia go camping with her boy-friend.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我们应该让Sylvia和她男友一起去宿营。

sentences.english: I don't think we're talking about quantum mechanics here.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为我们这里是在讨论量子力学的问题。

sentences.english: Where do you think this user would look for a cue?
sentences.chinese: 那么你认为他会在哪里找这些线索呢？

sentences.english: It is shown that the potential copper resource in the East Tianshan Mountains is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 预测认为，东天山地区铜的资源潜力巨大。

sentences.english: In my opinion, the number of private cars should be put under control.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，应该控制私家车的数量。

sentences.english: They can also be thought of as functions mapping classes to new subclasses.
sentences.chinese: 它们也可以被认为是将类映射到新子类的函数。

sentences.english: If you feel you have reached this page in error then please contact our webmaster .
sentences.chinese: 如果你认为这已达成一页误差则请洽我们的站长。

sentences.english: Officials say new information led to the remains at what is believed to be the crash site.
sentences.chinese: 官方人员称新信息领导着剩余的被认为在撞碎的地方。

sentences.english: Frankfurterin:Do you think that Eintracht will be promoted this season?
sentences.chinese: 你认为法兰克福这个赛季会晋级吗？

sentences.english: I don't think this show is primetime material.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这算不上是黄金时段的节目。

sentences.english: Many believe that is posturing on Buck's part but Arsenal are digging their heels in.
sentences.chinese: 很多人认为这是在故作姿态，但阿森那还在固执着。

sentences.english: The researchers believe that the findings do apply to humans.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员认为，这项研究结果也适用于人类。

definition: in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
